title: E14 The Old School House of Pies and Freud’s Field Day
description: “Meet us at the Monte V!” In this episode, Em tells Christine all about the haunted Hotel Monte Vista, which features a fun dude who hangs raw meat on the chandeliers and some ghosts that just wanna have a drink. Meanwhile, Christine brings down the mood with the disturbing story of Josef Fritzl and his underground prison. And that’s why we drink…
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
